20110111001014.000|20110111001014.000|CC1|          ( announcer )

20110111001016.000|20110111001016.000|CC1|      can help control your

20110111001019.000|20110111001019.000|CC1| with symptoms of frequent urges
20110111001019.000|20110111001023.000|CC1|    and leaks, day and night.   
20110111001023.000|20110111001023.000|CC1|       If you have certain      
20110111001023.000|20110111001025.000|CC1|  stomach or glaucoma problems, 
20110111001025.000|20110111001025.000|CC1|       or trouble emptying      
20110111001025.000|20110111001026.000|CC1|          your bladder,         
20110111001026.000|20110111001028.000|CC1|      do not take VESIcare.     
20110111001028.000|20110111001028.000|CC1|       VESIcare may cause       
20110111001028.000|20110111001030.000|CC1|       allergic reactions       
20110111001030.000|20110111001031.000|CC1|      that may be serious.      
20110111001031.000|20110111001031.000|CC1|   If you experience swelling   
20110111001031.000|20110111001033.000|CC1|       of the face, lips,       
20110111001033.000|20110111001033.000|CC1|  throat or tongue, stop taking 
20110111001033.000|20110111001036.000|CC1|VESIcare and get emergency help.
20110111001036.000|20110111001037.000|CC1|   Tell your doctor right away  
20110111001037.000|20110111001037.000|CC1|       if you have severe       
20110111001037.000|20110111001039.000|CC1|         abdominal pain         
20110111001039.000|20110111001039.000|CC1|      or become constipated     
20110111001039.000|20110111001042.000|CC1|     for three or more days.    
20110111001042.000|20110111001042.000|CC1|       VESIcare may cause       
20110111001042.000|20110111001043.000|CC1|         blurred vision,        
20110111001043.000|20110111001043.000|CC1|  so use caution while driving  
20110111001043.000|20110111001046.000|CC1|     or doing unsafe tasks.

20110111001046.000|20110111001048.000|CC1|    dry mouth, constipation,    
20110111001048.000|20110111001050.000|CC1|        and indigestion.
